headline: Amazon Buys a Wearables Company. Why It’s Joining Apple and Meta in the AI Hardware Race.
summary: Amazon.com  is acquiring a start-up specializing in wearable devices powered by artificial intelligence.  Amazon is buying wearables start-up Bee, according to a social-media post by Bee co-founder Maria de Lourdes Zollo.  An Amazon spokesperson said in an emailed statement that while a deal has been signed, the agreement hasn’t closed, and didn’t provide details on the acquisition price.
